org.apache.jackrabbit.core.persistence

Class PMContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.core.persistence.PMContext

  • public class PMContext
extends Object
    A PMContext is used to provide context information for a PersistenceManager.
    See Also:
    PersistenceManager.init(PMContext)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PMContext(File homeDir, FileSystem fs, NodeId rootNodeId, NamespaceRegistry nsReg, NodeTypeRegistry ntReg, DataStore dataStore, RepositoryStatisticsImpl stats)
      Creates a new PMContext.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DataStore getDataStore()
      Returns the data store
      FileSystem getFileSystem()
      Returns the virtual filesystem for this persistence manager

      Returns the physical home directory for this persistence manager
      NamespaceRegistry getNamespaceRegistry()
      Returns the namespace registry
      NodeTypeRegistry getNodeTypeRegistry()
      Returns the node type registry
      RepositoryStatisticsImpl getRepositoryStatistics()
      Returns the repository statistics collector.
      NodeId getRootNodeId()
      Returns the id of the root node
